official_title: To enhance the resources available to community development credit unions.
short_title: Credit Union Community Development Enhancement Act of 1993

summary.text: Credit Union Community Development Enhancement Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to authorize appropriations for the Community Development Revolving Fund. Authorizes the National Credit Union Administration Board to: (1) invest idle moneys in Federal Treasury securities; and (2) exercise the authority granted it by the Community Development Credit Union Revolving Fund Transfer Act.

titles.title: Credit Union Community Development Enhancement Act of 1993
To enhance the resources available to community development credit unions.
